body.value:
Nexus Travel is the foremost fictitious space tourism company of the 21st century. We provide completely non-real tourism packages designed to awaken your adventurous spirit!

Be bold

Civilian space travel is safer than its never been. With just a few thousand spacecoin, you can get access to our state of the art training and preparation facility. Learn about the intricacies of interplanetary geometry between trips to the spa for relaxation treatments.

Enjoy the ride

With 3 daily shuttles to our orbital space terminal, you can take comfort in knowing that your experience is safe and fun. Aside from the 3g's of force crushing your body on the way up, the rest of the trip is gentle and relaxing.

Help science

All civilian astronauts are invited to take part in one or more ongoing studies. You can not only enjoy the thrill of modern space travel, but also the thrill of scientific discovery. Well, probably not discovery, but at least data collection!

Call to action

Visit our learning center online or in person to find out how you can become an astronaut too!

Find out more
